mapper.sql: user_install_id, account_id, phone_num, device_id, phone_type, product_id, app_name, app_version, first_time, last_time, create_time, create_man, modify_time, modify_man, state, is_gjplatform, remark1, remark2, remark3
mapper.select: select count(distinct(account_id)) as account_sum from user_install_info

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT (t1.account_id)) FROM user_install_info t1 LEFT JOIN (SELECT first_time, account_id FROM user_install_info WHERE app_name = '贷款管家' ) t2 ON t1.account_id = t2.account_id WHERE t1.app_name = #{appName} AND ( TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(t1.first_time) ) < 7 AND t2.first_time <= t1.first_time

select
distinct
from user_install_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into user_install_info (user_install_id, account_id, phone_num, device_id, phone_type, product_id, app_name, app_version, first_time, last_time, create_time, create_man, modify_time, modify_man, state, is_gjplatform, remark1, remark2, remark3) values (#{userInstallId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isGjplatform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into user_install_info
user_install_id,
account_id,
phone_num,
device_id,
phone_type,
product_id,
app_name,
app_version,
first_time,
last_time,
create_time,

modify_man,

is_gjplatform,
remark1,
remark2,
remark3,

mapper.update:
update user_install_info
user_install_id = #{record.userInstallId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_id = #{record.accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_num = #{record.phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
device_id = #{record.deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_type = #{record.phoneType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_id = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_name = #{record.appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_version = #{record.appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
first_time = #{record.firstTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_time = #{record.lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_man = #{record.createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_man = #{record.modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_gjplatform = #{record.isGjplatform,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark1 = #{record.remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark2 = #{record.remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark3 = #{record.remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update user_install_info set user_install_id = #{record.userInstallId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_id = #{record.accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_num = #{record.phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, device_id = #{record.deviceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_type = #{record.phoneType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_id = #{record.productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_name = #{record.appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_version = #{record.appVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_time = #{record.firstTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_time = #{record.lastTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{record.createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_man = #{record.modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_gjplatform = #{record.isGjplatform,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark1 = #{record.remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{record.remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark3 = #{record.remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone_num = #{phoneNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

phone_type = #{phoneType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where user_install_id = #{userInstallId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
